data.title: St. George Chaldean Church in Shelby Township Michigan
data.meta_description: Come learn about our parish and celebrate mass with us. We have multiple times where we celebrate Chaldean, English, and Arabic Catholic Mass.
data.text:
I am so glad that you are here browsing through our website!

St. George Chaldean Catholic Church hosts a large number of very active ministries, events, and programs for all ages. St. George is a community of believers that strive to live their faith by making a difference for Christ in the world.

As you look through this site, you will discover the richness of ministry in our parish and the many opportunities available to become more involved in living the Catholic faith by putting your unique gifts at the service of the Lord.

Our patron, St. George, a soldier who defended the church and was never afraid to confess his faith even in the midst of difficult situations.

In our own time and place, within our families and neighborhoods, at work and in our parish, let us do the same: Bring Christ to others through our actions, supported by prayers of the Blessed Virgin Mary and nourished by the Holy Eucharist.

May God bless you and your families,
